code: import React,{useState}from'react';import useForm from'../hooks/useForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookForm=_ref=>{let{onAddBook}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[author,setAuthor]=useState('');const[year,setYear]=useState();const{validate}=useForm(values=>{const errors={};if(!values.title)errors.title='Title is required';if(!values.author)errors.author='Author is required';if(!values.year)errors.year='Year is required';return errors;});const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();validate({title,author,year});if(title&&author&&year){const newBook={id:Date.now(),title,author,year:Number(year)};onAddBook(newBook);setTitle('');setAuthor('');setYear(undefined);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"title",children:"T\xEDtulo:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"author",children:"Autor:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"author",value:author,onChange:e=>setAuthor(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"year",children:"Ano:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"year",value:year,onChange:e=>setYear(e.target.valueAsNumber),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Cadastrar Livro"})]});};export default BookForm;
